name: Freshman Immigration II
long_desc: This course is ONLY offered at Carnegie Mellon in Qatar.    Students and instructors will solve different problems each week by searching the Web and other likely places for answers. The problems will be submitted by other faculty who will grade the quality of the answers. Students will learn strategies and techniques for finding information on the Web more efficiently learn when to start with a search engine, a subjectoriented directory, or other tools explore and practice using advanced search syntax for major search engines experience specialized search engines for images, sound, multimedia, newsgroups, and discussion lists as well as subjectspecific search engines discover valuable resources to help keep you uptodate in this fastchanging environment.
